<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H1760|דָּחָה]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דַּחֲוָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** dubious; — plural absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דַּחֲוָן‎</span> [[Dan.6.19|Dan 6:19]], [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] conject.; [[BDB#AV|AV]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] ***instrument of music*** (so [[BDB#AE|AE]], assuming meaning ***strike*** [strings] for <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דְּחָא‎</span> [Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּחָה‎</span>] ***thrust***; [[BDB#Saad|Saad]] [[BDB#RV|RVm]] ***dancing-girls***; Bertholet al. ***concubines*** (from sens. obsc. of Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, but then read probably <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְחֵנָן‎</span> ([[Dan.5.2|Dan 5:2]]; [[Dan.5.3|Dan 5:3]]; [[Dan.5.23|Dan 5:23]]) Marti Prince [[BDB#Dr|Dr]].
